title: Mbappe Wants Out of PSG
description:
The FC crew react to reports that Kylian Mbappe has asked to leave PSG. Julien Laurens joins the show to discuss why the forward wants to leave and where he could possibly move to next. Plus, the guys break down Chelsea's dominant win at AC Milan and question if Fikayo Tomori's controversial red card was the correct decision.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Mbappe asks to leave PSG in January; Chelsea dominate AC Milan amid controversial red card; Rudiger saves the day for Madrid
